==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ぞう|お|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
zouwo > zoowo > zoːwo > zoːo.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぞうお|hhira=ぞうを|kyu=憎惡}}

# [[hatred]], [[hostility]]
#: {{ja-usex|憎悪が高まる|ぞうお が たかまる|hatred is mounting}}
#: {{ja-usex|二分間憎悪|にふんかんぞうお|Two Minutes Hate}}

====Synonyms====

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|愛情|あいじょう|gloss=[[love]]}}
* {{ja-r|愛慕|あいぼ|gloss=love, [[affection]]}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|ぞうお|hhira=ぞうを|kyu=憎惡}}

# to [[hate]]; to have a [[hatred]]

====Antonyms====
* [[愛慕|愛慕する]] (''aibo suru'', "to [[love]]")
